bioconda.name: bioconductor-gmrp
bioconda.summary: GWAS-based Mendelian Randomization and Path Analyses

biotools.summary: Perform Mendelian randomization analysis of multiple SNPs to determine risk factors causing disease of study and to exclude confounding variabels and perform path analysis to construct path of risk factors to the disease.

bioschemas.name: GMRP
bioschemas.summary: Perform Mendelian randomization analysis of multiple SNPs to determine risk factors causing disease of study and to exclude confounding variabels and perform path analysis to construct path of risk factors to the disease.
